subject: ACTSC
title: Actuarial Risk Management
description: This course considers actuarial risk management in the context of practical applications in life and non-life insurance, and in pensions. Topics covered include the role of the actuary; methods for pricing and reserving in life and non-life insurance; regulatory capital; risk transfer through reinsurance or securitization; product development; model risk and governance; pension risk management; embedded options in life insurance.
